description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

FederationParameters.description: Additional parameters to identify Federation mode

SamlMetadataURL.description: SAML metadata URL to link with the Environment
SamlMetadataURL.markdownDescription:
SAML metadata URL to link with the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^https?://[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%=~_|]{1,1000}  
Update requires: No interruption

FederationProviderName.description: Federation provider name to link with the Environment
FederationProviderName.markdownDescription:
Federation provider name to link with the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: [^_\p{Z}][\p{L}\p{M}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}][^_\p{Z}]+  
Update requires: No interruption

SamlMetadataDocument.description: SAML metadata document to link the federation provider to the Environment
SamlMetadataDocument.markdownDescription:
SAML metadata document to link the federation provider to the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1000  
Maximum Length: 10000000  
Pattern: .*  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Pattern: ^https?://[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%=~_|]{1,1000}  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Maximum Length: 128

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

FirstName.markdownDescription:
First name

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,50}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LastName.markdownDescription:
Last name

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,50}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Email address

---

Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128

Name of the Environment

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String

KmsKeyId.description: KMS key used to encrypt customer data within FinSpace Environment infrastructure
KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
KMS key used to encrypt customer data within FinSpace Environment infrastructure

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z-0-9-:\/]*{1,1000}$  
Update requires: Replacement

FederationMode.description: Federation mode used with the Environment
FederationMode.markdownDescription:
Federation mode used with the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LOCAL | FEDERATED  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentId.description: Unique identifier for representing FinSpace Environment
EnvironmentId.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier for representing FinSpace Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,26}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsAccountId.description: AWS account ID associated with the Environment
AwsAccountId.markdownDescription:
AWS account ID associated with the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,26}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
State of the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATE_REQUESTED | CREATING | CREATED | DELETE_REQUESTED | DELETING | DELETED | FAILED_CREATION | FAILED_DELETION | RETRY_DELETION | SUSPENDED  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentUrl.description: URL used to login to the Environment
EnvironmentUrl.markdownDescription:
URL used to login to the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+&@#/%=~_|]{1,1000}  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentArn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:finspace:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:\d+:environment/[0-9A-Za-z_-]{1,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

SageMakerStudioDomainUrl.description: SageMaker Studio Domain URL associated with the Environment
SageMakerStudioDomainUrl.markdownDescription:
SageMaker Studio Domain URL associated with the Environment

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z-0-9-:\/.]*{1,1000}$  
Update requires: No interruption

DedicatedServiceAccountId.description: ID for FinSpace created account used to store Environment artifacts
DedicatedServiceAccountId.markdownDescription:
ID for FinSpace created account used to store Environment artifacts

---

Required: No
